page.title: 15Churches - Hempnall Group
page.content: The parishes of{Morningthorpe, {Shelton and Fritton}are part{of the {Hempnall Group of eight parishes.}The Group is served by two full time clergymen and two non - stipendiary priests.There is one service at least in every church every sunday,except the first of the month when all joined together for a Group Service.In 1985 the Group celebrated its 21st anniversary with a festival including exhibitions in every church, a pilgrimage around all 8 churches and a party. Shelton church is a fine building with splendid acoustics. Concerts are held there by candlelight in the Winter.The tower of Fritton church has recently undergone many repairs, carried out by a local craftsman. The cost of repairs to all churches is increasing and with small congregations their future is in doubt
